name: Adventures of Griffri
description:
Griffri is a brave sorcerer who fights for justice and to keep peace.
Follow his adventure and bring peace to this world by killing wolves, ravens, spiders, snowman and orcs that have gone crazy.
Features:
Over 30 levels.
Challenging gameplay.
Melodious background music.
Find coins and improve character.

Note: You can play this game on your phone for free but it contains ADS.
